verses.text: Lo! the day of God is breaking; See the gleaming from afar! True at last in Man the Son of God; Captain; Let no heart in fear or doubt; Onward marching, firm and steady, Faint not, fear not Satan's frown; Conquering hosts with ban-ners wav-ing, Sweep-ing on o'er hill and plain.

Sons of earth, from slumber waking, Hail the bright and Morning Star; Jesus leads the gathering legions, In his name we shall prevail; Trust the Lord in with all ways, Till you wear the victor's crown; Ne'er shall halt till swells the anthem, 'Christ o'er all the world outright!'

chorus.text: Hear the call! O gird your armor on; Grasp the Spirit's mighty Sword; Take the helmet of salvation, Pressing on to battle for the Lord.
